edu.umn.nlpnewt

Class ConfigImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umn.nlpnewt.ConfigImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Config

    public final class ConfigImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Config
    Global system configuration object.

    By default, will attempt to load a configuration from the following locations:

    1. The NEWT-CONFIG environment variable
    2. $PWD/newtConfig.yaml
    3. $HOME/.newt/newtConfig.yaml
    4. /etc/newt/newtConfig.yaml

    Nested objects in the configuration yaml file will be flattened, for example the map: 

       {
     'a' : {
       'b': 1,
       'c': 2
     }
   }
    Will become the map: 
       {
     'a.b': 1,
     'a.c': 2
   }

        Loads a configuration from one of the default locations if there is a configuration file present.

        Loads a configuration from the parameter or one of the default locations if there is a configuration file present. Will use the default config if none are present.
        Parameters:
        configPath - An optional path to a file to attempt to load configuration from.
        Returns:
        Configuration object containing the flattened key-values from the yaml file.
